task.prompt: Write a function to remove all tuples with all none values in the given tuple list.

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Write a function to remove all tuples with all none values in the given tuple list.

test_list: assert remove_tuple([(1, 2), (2, None), (3, None), (24, 3), (None, None )] ) == '[(1, 2), (2, None), (3, None), (24, 3)]'
